xdi2.core.features.nodetypes

Class XdiCommonVariable

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.core.features.nodetypes.XdiAbstractContext<XdiCommonVariable>
      • xdi2.core.features.nodetypes.XdiCommonVariable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class XdiCommonVariable
extends XdiAbstractContext<XdiCommonVariable>
implements XdiVariable<XdiCommonVariable>
    An XDI common variable, represented as a context node.

    markus
